com.github.dkharrat.nexusdialog.controllers

Class LabeledFieldController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.dkharrat.nexusdialog.FormElementController
      • com.github.dkharrat.nexusdialog.controllers.LabeledFieldController
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DatePickerController, EditTextController, SearchableSelectionController, SelectionController, ValueController

    public abstract class LabeledFieldController
extends FormElementController
    An abstract class that represents a generic form field with an associated label.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LabeledFieldController(android.content.Context ctx, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String labelText, boolean isRequired)
      Creates a labeled field.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected abstract android.view.View createFieldView()
      Constructs the view associated with this field without the label.
      protected android.view.View createView()
      Constructs the view for this element.
      android.view.View getFieldView()
      Returns the associated view for the field (without the label view) of this element.
      java.lang.String getLabel()
      Returns the associated label for this field.
      boolean isRequired()
      Indicates whether this field requires an input value.
      boolean isValidInput()
      Indicates whether the input of this field has any validation errors.
      void setIsRequired(boolean required)
      Sets whether this field is required to have user input.
      java.util.List<ValidationError> validateInput()
      Runs a validation on the user input and returns all the validation errors of this field.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LabeledFieldController

        public LabeledFieldController(android.content.Context ctx,
                      java.lang.String name,
                      java.lang.String labelText,
                      boolean isRequired)
        Creates a labeled field.
        Parameters:
        ctx - the Android context
        name - the name of the field
        labelText - the label to display beside the field. If null, no label is displayed and the field will occupy the entire length of the row.
        isRequired - indicates whether this field is required. If true, this field checks for a non-empty or non-null value upon validation. Otherwise, this field can be empty.

    • Method Detail

      • getLabel

        public java.lang.String getLabel()
        Returns the associated label for this field.
        Returns:
        the associated label for this field

      • setIsRequired

        public void setIsRequired(boolean required)
        Sets whether this field is required to have user input.
        Parameters:
        required - if true, this field checks for a non-empty or non-null value upon validation. Otherwise, this field can be empty.

      • isRequired

        public boolean isRequired()
        Indicates whether this field requires an input value.
        Returns:
        true if this field is required to have input, otherwise false

      • isValidInput

        public boolean isValidInput()
        Indicates whether the input of this field has any validation errors.
        Returns:
        true if there are some validation errors, otherwise false

      • validateInput

        public java.util.List<ValidationError> validateInput()
        Runs a validation on the user input and returns all the validation errors of this field.
        Returns:
        a list containing all the validation errors

      • getFieldView

        public android.view.View getFieldView()
        Returns the associated view for the field (without the label view) of this element.
        Returns:
        the view for this element

      • createFieldView

        protected abstract android.view.View createFieldView()
        Constructs the view associated with this field without the label. It will be used to combine with the label.
        Returns:
        the newly created view for this field
